reviewText:
Award winning DVDs feature the life-size green bear named Kelly, who serves as a hero and teacher to five children. The author interacts with other children in a classroom setting. In addition, there is a scene at home and at school. Go to: [...] and click on each TITLE for details and for a short sample of each of the 10 DVDs.
Emotional Development and Self-Understanding
Respectfulness and Friendship Skills
Social Competence and Positive Behaviors
Problem Solving Skills and Anger Management
Healthy Living Habits and Refusal Skills
Personal Safety
Secret Touching
Bullying
Resolving Disputes
Self Control
